mapper.select: SELECT it.idx_product , pct.category , pt.product_name , ct.client_name , it.current_stock , pt.minimum_stock FROM product_tb pt JOIN client_tb ct ON ct.idx_business = pt.idx_business JOIN product_category_tb pct ON pct.idx_product_category = pt.idx_product_category JOIN inventory_tb it ON it.idx_product = pt.idx_product ORDER BY it.idx_product
